item.title: Dirty Stream: Exploiting Android's File Sharing - Part 1
item.description: An in-depth exploration of exploiting a path traversal vulnerability in Android using the ‘Dirty Stream’ technique. This post covers initial exploration, refining a defanged PoC, and achieving a successful file write, while also discussing key mitigations.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Angelo Alviar, and I have around 5 years of experience in red teaming, penetration testing, and application security. I love learning about mobile application security.
